definition: to eat without paying/to eat for free

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])

sentences.english: Come to my house and you won't have to pay for anything.
sentences.chinese: 暑假你跟我回家，你就可以在我家白吃白住。

sentences.english: W3: I never have to pay for anything. Everywhere I go, I can stay and eat for free.
sentences.chinese: 我走到哪儿都不用花钱，白吃白住。

sentences.english: I told him to stop being a freeloader and get out and find another job.
sentences.chinese: 我告诉他不要继续白吃白住，到外面去再找一个工作。

sentences.english: In America even if you live with your relatives, You cannot be a freeloader.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，即使你跟亲人住，也不能白吃白喝。

sentences.english: Even bees don't eat for free.

definition: to eat plain rice/(fig.) to eat and not pay for it/to sponge off others/to freeload
to give a dinner party/to entertain guests/to invite to dinner
deficiency/deficit/luckily/it's lucky that.../(often ironically) fancy that...
Don't get a reward if it's not deserved. (idiom)
in your dreams!/as if!/You wish!/I wish that were so
